name: Magirl
description:
Game Overview

Genre Jump Action

Play time 3 to 5 minutes

Supported OS Windows

Release date 2021-06-19

How to play

Spacebar to jump

Click to select an item or pause

Difference between the demo version and the full version

The trial version allows you to enjoy an adventure of up to 100 meters

The full version has no distance limit and comes with extra files!

Update History

2021-06-19 Magirl-1.0.1 released
